statements.statement: update SWfsOperationPicture set DataState=255 where PagePositionNo=@ModuleId
update SWfsOperationPicture set DataState=255 where PictureManageId=@PictureManageId
select ModuleId from SWfsIndexModule (nolock) where DateCreate=@DateCreate and OperateUserId=@OperateUserId
select * from SWfsIndexModule (nolock) where ModuleId=@ModuleId

select [LinkId] ,[ModuleId] ,[LinkName] ,[CategoryNo] ,[LinkHref] ,[LinkType] ,[DateCreate] ,[OperateUserId] ,[UpdateDate] ,[UpdateOperateUserId] ,[SortId] ,[Stutas] ,[DataState] from SWfsIndexModuleLink (nolock) where ModuleId=@ModuleId

select [LinkId] ,[ModuleId] ,[LinkName] ,[CategoryNo] ,[LinkHref] ,[LinkType] ,[DateCreate] ,[OperateUserId] ,[UpdateDate] ,[UpdateOperateUserId] ,[SortId] ,[Stutas] ,[DataState] from SWfsIndexModuleLink (nolock) where ModuleId=@ModuleId and DateCreate=@DateCreate

with temp as( select PictureManageId ,PictureFileNo ,PictureName ,LinkAddress ,SortId ,PageNo ,PagePositionNo ,PagePositionName ,DateBegin ,PictureIndex ,DateEnd ,DataState ,row_number() over(order by DateCreate desc) as _row from SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) where 1=1 and PictureName like '%'+cast(@PictureName as nvarchar)+'%' #if($DateBegin!='') and DateBegin >= @DateBegin #end #if($DateEnd!='') and DateBegin <= @DateEnd #end and PagePositionNo=@moduleId and datastate=1 and PageNo='index' and WebSiteNo='shangpin.com' )select PictureManageId ,PictureFileNo ,PictureName ,LinkAddress ,PictureIndex ,SortId ,PageNo ,PagePositionNo ,PagePositionName ,DateBegin ,DateEnd ,DataState from temp where _row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

select count(1) from SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) where 1=1 and PictureName like '%'+cast(@PictureName as nvarchar)+'%' #if($DateBegin!='') and DateBegin >= @DateBegin #end #if($DateEnd!='') and DateBegin <= @DateEnd #end and PagePositionNo=@moduleId and datastate=1 and PageNo='index' and WebSiteNo='shangpin.com'
select * from SWfsOperationPicture where PictureManageId=@PictureManageId

with temp as( select [NavigationId] ,[NavigationTitle] ,[NavigationLink] ,[SortId] ,[CreateDate] ,[Status] ,[DataState] ,[OperateUserId] ,[UpdateOperateUserId] ,[UpdateDate] ,row_number() over(order by DateCreate desc) as _row from SWfsNavigationManage (nolock) where datastate=1 )select * from temp where _row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize
select count(1) from SWfsNavigationManage (nolock) where datastate=1
update SWfsNavigationManage set DataState=255 where NavigationId=@NavigationId
select * from SWfsNavigationManage (nolock) where NavigationId=@NavigationId
select * from SWfsOperationPicture(nolock) where PictureManageId=@PictureManageId
update SWfsOperationPicture set DataState=255 where PictureManageId=@PictureManageId

select * from SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) where 1=1 #if($PageNo!='') and PageNo=@PageNo #end #if($PictureIndex>-1) and PictureIndex=@PictureIndex #end #if($PagePositionNo!='') and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo #end and datastate=1 and status=1

select * from ( SELECT top 1 * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 AND c.DataState=1 #if($PageNo!='') AND c.PageNo = @PageNo #end #if($PagePositionNo!='') AND c.PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo #end AND PictureIndex=0 AND c.DateBegin <= GETDATE() ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC) AS p1 UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT top 1 * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 AND c.DataState=1 #if($PageNo!='') AND c.PageNo = @PageNo #end #if($PagePositionNo!='') AND c.PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo #end AND PictureIndex=1 AND c.DateBegin <= GETDATE() ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC) AS p2 UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT top 1 * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 AND c.DataState=1 #if($PageNo!='') AND c.PageNo = @PageNo #end #if($PagePositionNo!='') AND c.PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo #end AND PictureIndex=2 AND c.DateBegin <= GETDATE() ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC) AS p3
order by PictureIndex asc

SELECT top 1 * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 AND c.DataState=1 #if($PageNo!='') AND c.PageNo = @PageNo #end #if($PagePositionNo!='') AND c.PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo #end And DateBegin <= GETDATE() ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC
select top 1 * from SWfsIndexModule (nolock) where ADShowType=3 and dataState=1 and PageNo='index' and WebSiteNo='shangpin.com'
select * from SWfsIndexModule (nolock) where dataState=1 and PageNo='index' and WebSiteNo='shangpin.com' order by sort asc
select * from SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) where PagePositionNo=@ModuleId and datastate=1 and PageNo='index' and WebSiteNo='shangpin.com'
select * from SwfsIndexModuleLink where LinkId=@LinkId
select * from SpfShopCategory where ParentCategoryNo=@ParentNo

select count(1) from SWfsOperationPicture where datastate=1 and CONVERT(varchar(100),DateBegin, 120)=CONVERT(varchar(100),@DateBegin, 120) and PagePositionNo=@ModuleId and PictureIndex=@PictureIndex and PageNo='index' and WebSiteNo='shangpin.com'

#if($ADShowType=='1') SELECT top 1 pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=2 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc #end #if($ADShowType=='2') select * from (SELECT top 1 pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=0 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p1 UNION select * from ( SELECT top 1 pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=1 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p2 #end #if($ADShowType=='3' ) SELECT pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateCreate Desc #end

SELECT count(1) FROM SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic left join SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where module.ModuleId=@ModuleId and pic.DataState=1 and pic.PictureIndex=@PictureIndex and pic.DateBegin=@DateBegin and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo

#if($ADShowType=='1') SELECT top 100 pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=2 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc #end #if($ADShowType=='2') select * from (SELECT top 100 pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=0 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p1 UNION select * from ( SELECT top 100 pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=1 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p2 #end #if($ADShowType=='3' ) SELECT pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo and module.moduleid=@ModuleId order by pic.DateCreate Desc #end

select * from (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 and datastate=1 AND c.WebSiteNo='shangpin.com' AND c.PageNo=@PageNo AND c.PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo AND c.PictureIndex = 1 AND c.DateBegin <= GETDATE() ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC) AS p1 UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 and datastate=1 AND c.WebSiteNo='shangpin.com' AND c.PageNo=@PageNo AND c.PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo AND c.PictureIndex = 2 AND c.DateBegin <= GETDATE() ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC) AS p2 UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 and datastate=1 AND c.WebSiteNo='shangpin.com' AND c.PageNo=@PageNo AND c.PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo AND c.PictureIndex = 3 AND c.DateBegin <= GETDATE() ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC) AS p3 UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 and datastate=1 AND c.WebSiteNo='shangpin.com' AND c.PageNo=@PageNo AND c.PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo AND c.PictureIndex = 4 AND (c.DateBegin <= GETDATE() AND c.DateEnd > GETDATE()) ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC) AS p4
SELECT * FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 and datastate=1 AND c.WebSiteNo='shangpin.com' AND c.PageNo='index' AND c.PagePositionNo='SwitchPictureImgMap' ORDER BY c.DateBegin DESC
SELECT count(1) FROM SWfsOperationPicture c WHERE c.[Status] = 1 and datastate=1 AND c.PagePositionNo='SwitchPictureImgMap' AND GETDATE()>=c.DateBegin AND c.DateEnd >GETDATE()
select NavigationId,NavigationTitle,NavigationLink,SortId,CreateDate,[Status],DataState,OperateUserId,UpdateOperateUserId,UpdateDate from SWfsNavigationManage order by SortId desc
update SWfsNavigationManage set SortId=@SortId where NavigationId =@NavigationId
update SWfsNavigationManage set NavigationTitle=@NavigationTitle, NavigationLink=@NavigationLink where NavigationId =@NavigationId
delete from SWfsNavigationManage where NavigationId =@NavigationId
select max(SortId) as SortId from SWfsNavigationManage
update SWfsSpHomeRecommendBrand set DataState=255 where RecommendBrandID=@RecommendBrandID
